title: GOTG: The Bet
description: 3D game developed in 4 months. Completely built with C++, using the home-made game engine "Hello Engine".

title: Hello Engine
description: A 3D game engine made with C++. Includes several features; scripting system, resource manager, custom file format...

title: Pirates
description: A simple physics-based 2D game. Made with a simple 2D physics engine made by the team!
